attributes.action: Over rule the descision of the British Officilas in Nepal when not allowing a case of humanity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tul Bahadur Pun VC,At the age of 84 and having served with exemplary conduct for 18 years whilst serving with the British Army has been refused entry to the Uk by the British Officials in Nepal.They state the reason as "He has failed to demonstrate that you have strong ties with the UK"This man won the VC whilst fighting for Britain,what stronger ties can one man have?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
